extensionDescription: Adds a phishing report button to the toolbar.
extensionButtonTooltip: Initiates the reporting process for unwanted e-mails.
extensionFraudReportTooltip: Report this e-mail as potentially malicious.
extensionOptionsTooltip: View and change reporting plugin configuration.
optionsActionJunk: move it to the junk folder
optionsActionTrash: delete it (move to the trash folder)
optionsSMTPRecipientLabel: E-Mail address to send reports to
reportCommentPrompt: The E-Mail will be forwarded to your security team.
reportCommentJunk: It will then be moved to your junk folder.
reportError: Reporting failed, please try again later.
simulationAckSuccessBody: You reported a suspicious E-Mail that is part of our phishing training campaign. Thank you!
